relation: The coldest month of the year as mercury can dip to sub zero levels. A good time for sightseeing bit extra care is required if travelling with kids or old people. The sky remains clear with plenty of sunshine but the cold waves make the days very cold.

The weather is cold with cool days and chilly night. Woolens are recommended. There is enough sunshine during the mornings and temperatures can reach comfortable level. Good time for taking up tour packages for Amritsar and enjoying the best of sightseeing as well as outdoor activities.

Temperature starts to rise but is still within the comfortable range. The sky remains clear during the days and cool breezes helps is maintaining the temperature within control. One of the best month for travelling to Amritsar.

The weather starts to ger warmer and the temperature might increase beyond the liking of most of the tourists. Days are hot as the sky is blue for most part of the day and the heat of the sun transforms the cool breeze to warm winds.

The temperature starts to rise and it reaches to an uncomfortable level. Evenings can be comparatively cooler, but might not be the best time for sightseeing during the day as sunstroke is common. Being an off season month, the rates for Amritsar holiday packages are comparatively less as compared to the best season months.

The month begins with plenty of blue skies, but monsoons will arrive by the mid of this month. On the positive side, temperatures will come down to comfortable level, but the humidity increases making it difficult to travel. This is one of the hottest month of the year.
Monsoons are truly here and it may often rain for long hours making the climate very humid. Heat coupled with humidity makes this month not the best time for tourism in Amritsar.

Rains continue making this the wettest month of the year. There will be very little blue sky. This is also the coolest month of the year although average high temperature is still high. Might not be the best time for day activities as humidity is persistent.

Rainfall settles to a less annoying level and monsoons will completely go away by the end of this month. The sky will be a mixture of cloud and blue and there may be a few showers and the occasional heavy downpour but the main rains have finished.

This month marks the beginning of the official tourist season for Amritsar and the weather is comfortably warm and pleasant. Post monsoons the natural beauty of the place has increases bounty times. Good time for sightseeing and outdoor activities.

The sky is mostly blue with plenty of passing white clouds. A good time for visiting the city as the temperature starts to drop and settles to a comfortable level. One of the best months to enjoy holiday in Amritsar. The weather is pleasing and enjoyable for outdoor activities and sightseeing. Winters begin from the end of this month.

Winters are here and the temperature starts to drip, especially during the last week of the month. A good time for sightseeing and indulging in various outdoor activities as the weather is cool during the days and cold at night. Special care is required in case you are travelling with kids.
